title: Quilts in women's lives
creator_credit: Pat Ferrero and New Day Films
brief_description: A multi-award winning film on the traditional art of quiltmaking and its affect on the lives of seven women. Each from quite diverse backgrounds, the women discuss the influences that inspire quilt design, and how their lives and times are depicted in their work.
